00049 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 void CUITextChangeDlg::DoDataExchange
00051     (
00052     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00053     )
00054 {
00055     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00056     DDX_CBIndex( aDataExchange, IDC_UITEXT_CBO_ITEM, mListIndex );
00057     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_UITEXT_EDIT_NEWTEXT, mNewText );
00058 }

00073 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 void CUITextChangeDlg::OnChange()
00079 {
00080     BOOL formValid = TRUE;
00081 
00082 #if !SKIP_VALIDATION
00083     UpdateData( TRUE );
00084     if( mListIndex == -1 || mNewText.GetLength() == 0 || mNewText.GetLength() >= 50 )
00085         formValid = FALSE;
00086 #endif
00087 
00088     if( formValid )
00089         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00090     else
00091         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00092 }
00093 
00094 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00099 void CUITextChangeDlg::OnBnClickedOk()
00100 {
00101     char    uiText[50];
00102 
00103     UpdateData( TRUE );
00104 
00105     WideCharToMultiByte( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, mNewText, -1, uiText, 50, NULL, NULL );
00106     uiText[49] = '\0';
00107 
00108     mCom.sendUserInterfaceText( mListIndex, uiText );
00109     OnOK();
00110 }
